name: Shadow Ninja Platformer
description:
Can you enter the shrine like a real ninja?

Prototype # 1 / 8

General Information:

  • Genre: platformer
  • Unusual game mechanics:  working everywhere hook and ghost mode

Prototype platformer mechanic. Reach the finish line without being noticed and collect enough coins.

Write in the comments how long did it take you?

Controls:

  • A, D - Movement
  • SPACE or W - Jump
  • Num 1 - Dash
  • Num 2 - Somersault
  • Num 3 - Hook (and use your mouse)
